keyPolicies.policyDescription: Shas Sheehan led over 15,000 signatures against cuts in A&E and Maternity at Kingston Hospital.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fake Eco Park at Raynes Park
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes the so-called Eco Park which is merely a vehicle pound not a green space.
Fights against cuts to the Freedom Pass.

Pledges to be an honest politician who won't employ family, publish all expense claims, not take on other paid employment, not claim for a second home, have a constituency office in the constituency, and hold regular weekly surgeries.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Lib Dems are the fastest growing party in Wimbledon in contrast to Labour and Conservatives.

issues.environment: Shas has a background in Environmental Toxicology and will be able to fight for green issues more effectively.
issues.health: Shas Sheehan led a campaign against cuts to NHS services, specifically addressing A&E and Maternity services at Kingston Hospital.

endorsements.endorsement: Join Liberal Democrats in support of Shas Sheehan. Supports across Wimbledon.

quotes.text: Shas fought to keep the local shop. She was always there when we needed her the most.
Shas will be a strong voice for the ordinary people in the council. She has my vote.
I think it's great to have someone like Shas fighting for people and campaigning for issues.

images.caption: Shas Sheehan leading a group in a campaign.
